cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to meander in the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then lift generally northward into the central Gulf of Mexico late week toward the northern Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northern Gulf Coast (most likely Louisiana coast)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico (southern Bay of Campeche)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico including Campeche and Veracruz
